name: Nuclear Car
description:
You're a guy who stole a nuclear car from a secret government project but after driving you're feeling incredibly hot temperature and realized it's a heat from the car. As this is cold fusion to not melt this car and explode with it you need to gather bottles of water from the field and cool a car with water in them. If you take too long it explodes and you die in a spectacular explosion.

Control:

WSAD - walking
